title: Colors 2018

metadata.description: Learn about Colors 2018 with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Every year the
Pantone Color Institute
evaluates the colors shown by fashion designers at the New York Fashion Week.
This information is used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the 
Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top fashion colors for the year:
Color of the Year 2018
Ultra Violet
HEX: #6B5B95
PANTONE 18-3838
Spring Colors 2018
Meadowlark
HEX: #ECDB54
Pantone 13-0646
Cherry Tomato
HEX: #E94B3C
Pantone 17-1563
Little Boy Blue
HEX: #6F9FD8
Pantone 16-4132
Chili Oil
HEX: #944743
Pantone 18-1440
Pink Lavender
HEX: #DBB1CD
Pantone 14-3207
Blooming Dahlia
HEX: #EC9787
PANTONE 15-1520
Arcadia
HEX: #00A591
PANTONE 16-5533
Ultra Violet
HEX: #6B5B95
PANTONE 18-3838
Emperador
HEX: #6C4F3D
Pantone 18-1028
Almost Mauve
HEX: #EADEDB
Pantone 12-2103
Spring Crocus
HEX: #BC70A4
PANTONE 17-3020
Lime Punch
HEX: #BFD641
PANTONE 13-0550
Classic Spring Colors 2018
Sailor Blue
HEX: #2E4A62
PANTONE 19-4034
Harbor Mist
HEX: #B4B7BA
PANTONE 14-4202
Warm Sand
HEX: #C0AB8E
PANTONE 15-1214
Coconut Milk
HEX: #F0EDE5
PANTONE 11-0608
Fall / Winter Colors 2018
Red Pear
HEX: #7F4145
Pantone 19-1536
Valiant Poppy
HEX: #BD3D3A
Pantone 18-1549
Nebulas Blue
HEX: #3F69AA
Pantone 18-4048
Ceylon Yellow
HEX: #D5AE41
Pantone 15-0850
Martini Olive
HEX: #766F57
Pantone 18-0625
Russet Orange
HEX: #E47A2E
Pantone 16-1255
Crocus Petal
HEX: #BE9EC9
Pantone 15-3520
Limelight
HEX: #F1EA7F
Pantone 12-0740
Quetzal Green
HEX: #006E6D
Pantone 18-5025
Classic Fall / Winter Colors 2018
Sargasso Sea
HEX: #485167
Pantone 19-4031
Tofu
HEX: #EAE6DA
Pantone 11-4801
Almond Buff
HEX: #D1B894
Pantone 14-1116
Quiet Gray
HEX: #BCBCBE
Pantone 14-4107
Meerkat
HEX: #A9754F
Pantone 16-1438
Downloads
The Fashion Color libraries can be downloaded from:
W3.CSS Fashion Colors

★
+1

practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors 2018 concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors 2018 effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors 2018 and how to apply it in your projects.
